Class PhotoViewer

  • Object
    • PhotoViewer

  • public class PhotoViewer
extends Object
    This class can be used to easily view images in swing windows as well as manipulate them

    Images are represented as a 3d int array. The dimensions describe the features as follows

    [row index] [column index] [color index]

    Row and Column : Determine which pixel you're refering to
    Color: Must be in the following range (0,1,2), represents (r,g,b) color values

      PhotoViewer(String file)
      Creates an instance of PhotoViewer from a filename
      PhotoViewer(String file, String name)
      Creates an instance of PhotoViewer from a filename and a desired name for the window

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhotoViewer

        public PhotoViewer(String file,
                   String name)
        Creates an instance of PhotoViewer from a filename and a desired name for the window
        Parameters:
        file - name of the image you wish to load (ex. "test.png")
        name - name which is shown on the titlebar of this window

      • PhotoViewer

        public PhotoViewer(String file)
        Creates an instance of PhotoViewer from a filename
        Parameters:
        file - name of the image you wish to load (ex. "test.png")

    • Method Detail

      • getImage

        public int[][][] getImage()
        returns the image which is represented in the window
        Returns:
        A 3d int array representing the image.

      • setImage

        public void setImage(int[][][] image)
        changes the image shown in the window
        Parameters:
        image - A 3d int array representing the image. The dimensions are as follows
        [row index][column index][color index]
        the color index can 0,1, or 2 which corespond to R,G, and B respectively

      • getImageAsString

        public String getImageAsString()
        creates a string representation of the image
        Returns:
        a string representation of the image
